TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含與工作流程執行個體的終止關聯的資料。

span.span: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 在工作流程執行個體終止時由執行階段追蹤基礎結構產生。A is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated. 如果與工作流程執行個體關聯的 包括設定用於 的 ，工作流程追蹤基礎結構會將 中的 放入它傳送至追蹤服務的 中。If the associated with a workflow instance includes a configured for a , the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the in in the that it sends to the tracking service. 工作流程執行個體可能以下列三種方式之一終止：主機呼叫 、從工作流程執行個體內叫用 活動，或可能發生未處理的例外狀況。A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call ; a activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur. 如果工作流程由主機或 活動終止，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會將 設定為 ，而且後者的 屬性會設定為終止的原因描述。If the workflow is terminated by the host or a activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets to a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果工作流程因未處理的例外狀況而終止，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會在 中傳遞未處理的例外狀況。If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in . > [!NOTE] > 只有執行階段追蹤服務會使用 ，在 中傳遞資訊。 is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a . 事件的資料則是在 中傳遞。The data for a event is passed in a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一個名稱為 `WriteTerminatedEventArgs` 的方法，該方法會擷取 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a . 程式碼會檢查 屬性是否為 `null` (Visual Basic 中的 `Nothing`)。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，程式碼會將與 屬性關聯的訊息寫入主控台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 是 `null` (`Nothing`)，程式碼不會將任何例外狀況資訊寫入主控台中。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜EventArgs 追蹤 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[< EventArgs 追蹤範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得導致工作流程執行個體終止的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

value.span: 導致工作流程執行個體終止的 。

span.span: The that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行個體因為未處理的例外狀況而終止時， 會包含未處理的例外狀況。When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, contains the unhandled exception. 如果是由主機對 的呼叫或由 活動終止工作流程執行個體時， 會包含將其 屬性設定為終止原因描述的 。When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to or by a activity, contains a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果主機終止工作流程執行個體，它會在 `string` 參數中提供此描述給 。如果是 終止工作流程執行個體，則由 提供描述。If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to ; if the workflow instance is terminated by a , the description is supplied by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一個名稱為 `WriteTerminatedEventArgs` 的方法，該方法會擷取 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a . 程式碼會檢查 屬性是否為 `null` (Visual Basic 中的 `Nothing`)。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，程式碼會將與 屬性關聯的訊息寫入主控台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 是 `null` (`Nothing`)，程式碼不會將任何例外狀況資訊寫入主控台中。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜EventArgs 追蹤 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[< EventArgs 追蹤範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
